name: HOME (itch) (muts, kolosoff, muzio)
description:
We all know that Home is where the Heart is.

 Therefore we bring to you Minimalist Interactive Body Oxygenation Simulator [M.I.B.O.S.] 

In this game, you control blood cells that oxygenate the body parts. The blood cells lose oxygen over time and will need to be brought to the heart to be recharged and multiplied. Each time a blood cell multiplies, its new instance cannot be controlled any more and will repeat the previous travelled path. Parts of the body will start turning darker as they lose oxygen and will die if left unattended. 

Controls: 

Move cell: W A S D

Restart game: ESC

Credits

Alex Kolosov (Gameplay, Art, Music) - art, music

Alex Muzio (Gameplay, Code) - github
